6 import os, pickle
7 from PyQt5.QtWidgets import QFileDialog, QMessageBox, QApplication
8 
9 
14 def openDialog(folder_path, file_ext):
15  if not os.path.isdir(folder_path):
16  folder_path = os.getcwd()
17  options = QFileDialog.Options()
18  options |= QFileDialog.DontUseNativeDialog
19  fname, _ = QFileDialog.getOpenFileName(
20  parent = None,
21  caption = 'Open file',
22  directory = folder_path,
23  filter = file_ext,
24  options = options)
25  return fname
26 
27 
33 def saveDialog(folder_path, file_ext):
34  if not os.path.isdir(folder_path):
35  folder_path = os.getcwd()
36  options = QFileDialog.Options()
37  options |= QFileDialog.DontUseNativeDialog
38  fname, _ = QFileDialog.getSaveFileName(
39  parent = None,
40  caption = 'Save file',
41  directory = folder_path,
42  filter = file_ext,
43  options = options)
44 
45  overwrite = False
46  if fname != "":
47  _, ext = os.path.splitext(fname)
48  _, ext_ = os.path.splitext(file_ext)
49  if ext == ext_:
50  overwrite = True
51  else:
52  fname = fname + ext_
53  return fname, overwrite
54 
55 
62 def openData(file_path="", ext=".pickle"):
63  dialog = False
64  _, ext_ = os.path.splitext(file_path)
65  if not os.path.isfile(file_path):
66  print("[loadData] wrong file directory.")
67  dialog = True
68  elif ext_ != ext:
69  print("[loadData] wrong extension.")
70  dialog = True
71 
72  if dialog:
73  file_path = openDialog(file_path, '*'+ext)
74  if not os.path.isfile(file_path):
75  print("[loadData] canceled.")
76  return None
77  try:
78  with open(file_path, 'rb') as f:
79  data = pickle.load(f)
80  print("[loadData] success: {0}".format(file_path))
81  return data
82  except Exception as e:
83  print("[loadData] {0}".format(e))
84  return None
85 
86 
94 def saveData(data, file_path="", ext=".pickle"):
95  dialog = False
96  dirname = os.path.dirname(file_path)
97  if not os.path.isdir(dirname):
98  print("[saveData] wrong folder directory.")
99  dialog = True
100  else:
101  _, ext_ = os.path.splitext(file_path)
102  if ext_ != ext:
103  print("[saveData] wrong extension.")
104  dialog = True
105  else:
106  if os.path.isfile(file_path): # 既存ファイルあり
107  ans = QMessageBox.question(None, "確認", "上書きしますか？", QMessageBox.Ok, QMessageBox.Cancel)
108  if ans!=QMessageBox.Ok:
109  print("[saveData] canceled")
110  return False
111 
112  if dialog: # ダイアログにて指定
113  file_path, _ = saveDialog(file_path, '*'+ext)
114  if not os.path.isfile(file_path):
115  print("[saveData] canceled")
116  return False
117  try:
118  with open(file_path, 'wb') as f:
119  pickle.dump(data, f)
120  print("[saveData] success: {0}".format(file_path))
121  return True
122  except Exception as e:
123  print("[saveData] {0}".format(e))
124  return False
